messages.content: {"mitigation": "Revised Confidentiality clause:\n\nConfidentiality. "Confidential Information" means only (i) information expressly marked as confidential by the disclosing Party, or (ii) information that a reasonable person would understand to be confidential given the circumstances of disclosure. Each Party may disclose Confidential Information to its affiliates, provided that such affiliates are bound by written agreements no less protective than this clause. Use of Confidential Information is limited to evaluating a potential business relationship. The confidentiality obligation shall survive for three (3) years after termination of this Agreement, except for trade secrets, which survive indefinitely. Any breach shall entitle the non‑breaching Party to injunctive relief and recovery of actual damages."}
